compiler.installGuide.windows:
On Windows, we recommend installing MinGW-w64 via MSYS2. Follow these steps:
  1. Install MSYS2 from https://www.msys2.org/
  2. Open the MSYS2 terminal and run: {0}
  3. Add the compiler's bin directory to your system's PATH (e.g., C:\msys64\ucrt64\bin).
compiler.installGuide.macos:
On macOS, you can install Clang by installing the Xcode Command Line Tools. Run this command in your terminal:

cli.init.nextSteps:
Next steps:
  1. (Optional) cd into '{0}' if you aren't already there.
  2. Modify 'std.cpp' with your standard solution.
  3. Modify 'make.ts' to define your test data.
  4. Run 'genesis make' to generate .in/.out files.
  5. Run 'genesis check' to test your solution against the standard one.
